body_html:
Just because it works with double type, doesn't mean it is not a bug.

Those two operations are equivalent, they should produce identical results also for the float type.

Seems like there is a double variable/tensor hardcoded somewhere in the native implementation of the matmul().

Not a big problem, we found a work around (don't use LinearLayer!). But it would be nice to be able to produce consistent output with it too.
